thread.section_title: SafeandVaultStore.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SafeandVaultStore.com | www.safeandvaultstore.com
thread.title: Casey

author: Casey
title: Casey
text:
Buying a safe is an investment so after months of research I decided on the BF series AMSEC safe. Top-Tier quality, American made (Note not all of the AMSEC lines are made in the USA), and one of the best reputations in the market.
Once I chose the brand and model I had to decide where to purchase the safe from. I talked with several other safe retailers and ended up picking the SafeandVaultStore.com due to their knowledgeable staff and competitive pricing.
The purchasing process was a breeze. I did run into an issue during the delivery process, however once I notified Heather from SafeandVaultStore.com she resolved the issue fast and effectively. I could not have asked for better service.
